basics.name: Júlio César de Souza
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Brazilian software developer, graduated with Computer Science bachelor degree on Universidade Federal do ABC. Experienced with development of C++ applications, Java and PHP web apps, using modern HTML, Javascript and CSS technics.

work.summary: Research for innovation projects, creating prototypes and modules for new financial solutions, such as mobile banking and cloud storage for documents.  Development and improvements of Java (RichFaces, Spring) web applications and C++ (Boost, Qt) modules for integration with legacy systems.

Development of C++ modules with Boost and Qt for the financial images processing application, integrating the platform with legacy system (using the ISO 8583 standard) and providing interfaces for other applications. Creation of Java web interfaces for monitoring and configuration, using frameworks like Spring, Hybernate and RichFaces.
highlights: Contributed to adopt better pratices, such as Maven builds and Continuous Integration with Jenkins
Used modern technologies to improve the web application usability

work.summary: Development and implementation of web sites, with custom platforms and well known CMS, as Wordpress and Joomla. Use of current technologies, reactive design and social, payments and maps APIs to build modern interfaces.

volunteer.summary: Translation of the Steam platform, games published by Valve and review of applicants
